senses.sense_definition: To bring a dead person or animal back to life.

examples.text: The powerful wizard used a spell to <w>resurrect</w> the fallen hero.
Many ancient myths tell stories of gods who can <w>resurrect</w> the dead.

senses.sense_definition: To bring something such as a custom, idea, or plan back into use or existence after it has disappeared or been forgotten.

examples.text: The director hopes to <w>resurrect</w> his career with this new movie.
Why <w>resurrect</w> the idea almost 25 years later?

senses.sense_definition: To return to life after being dead.

examples.text: In the legend, the magical bird burns and then <w>resurrects</w> from its own ashes.
The villagers believed that the spirit would <w>resurrect</w> in a new form.
